doc:
Luis Peña https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luis_Pe%C3%B1a 0 Luis Peña (20 June 1918 in Santander – 29 March 1977 in Madrid) was a Spanish actor. Peña came from a family of actors and performed in films and theater. His sister was the actress Pastora Peña. In 1946, he married Luchy Soto; the two formed a stage company. He worked on filmed plays for television which were shown on TVE in the 1960s. At the end of his career, he acted for Carlos Saura. Luis_Peña ( 20_June_1918 in Santander – 29_March_1977 in Madrid ) was a_Spanish_actor . Peña came from a_family of actors and performed in films_and_theater . His_sister was the_actress_Pastora_Peña . In 1946 , he married Luchy_Soto ; the_two formed a_stage_company . He worked on filmed_plays for television which were_shown on TVE in the_1960s . At the_end of his_career , he acted for Carlos_Saura .
